keyword: calories in starbucks spinach and feta wrap
title: Calories in Starbucks Spinach and Feta Wrap
meta_description: Learn calories in Starbucks spinach and feta wrap: 290 kcal per wrap, with protein, carbs, fats, sodium, and easy tweaks for customization.
h1: Calories in Starbucks Spinach and Feta Wrap
assumptions: Standard Starbucks menu item: egg whites, feta cheese, spinach, fire-roasted tomatoes, whole wheat wrap; no customizations or add-ons.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and customizations; values based on standard recipe. Check Starbucks app or packaging for latest info.

quick_answer.text: The Starbucks Spinach & Feta Wrap contains 290 kcal and 17 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Substitute whole eggs for egg whites

faqs.q: How many calories in Starbucks spinach and feta wrap?
What's the protein in Starbucks spinach feta wrap?
faqs.a: About 17 g protein from egg whites and feta.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in the Starbucks spinach and feta wrap?
faqs.a: 680 mg sodium, mostly from feta and wrap.

faqs.q: Are carbs high in Starbucks spinach and feta wrap?
faqs.a: 30 g total carbs, with 2 g fiber; from the whole wheat wrap.

faqs.q: Can I make the Starbucks spinach feta wrap lower calorie?
faqs.a: Yes, omit feta for ~230 kcal or request no wrap for a salad version.
